HELP — help menu
ADD WORD [word]: [translate], [translate], [...], [translate]; — add new word
ADD TRANSLATE [word in dictionary]: [translate], [...], [translate]; — add translate(s) to word
REMOVE WORD [word] — remove word from dictionary
REMOVE TRANSLATE [word]: [translate], [...], [translate]; — remove word translate(s) from dictionary
CLEAR — clear dictionary
PRINT DICT — print dictionary
PRINT WORD [word] — print word and translates from dictionary
